snippet.title: Camp Sunshine - Introduction Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the first 6 minutes of Camp Sunshine, a 16-bit Horror RPG comes to Steam this Halloween! 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/457570/

If you would like to review or let's play our game, please send us an e-mail via www.fossilgames.com, we'd love to speak with you!
